Fixed.

We expected that schema overview will be edited in the 'Documentation' page and 
neglected the fact that 'Overview' i.e. schema description will also appear in 
the description section in the main page if no other object is selected.

This problem is now fixed, but we still suggest to use the description section 
for element and attribute annotation and edit schema description in the 
Documentation page because more text can be seen there without scrolling.
